# iru_device_library_items (Data Source)

List library items and their status for a specific device.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_library_items" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "device_library_items" {
  value = data.iru_device_library_items.example.library_items
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `library_items` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--library_items))

<a id="nestedatt--library_items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `library_items`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `status` (String)
